sentences.en: The grandmother remained silent, not to mar the happiness of the child.
sentences.cn: 奶奶保持沉默，不想破坏孩子的幸福。

sentences.en: Baha Mar, a $2.6 billion project in Nassau that would have employed 4,400 building workers, has been stopped by the withdrawal of its American casino partner.
sentences.cn: Baha Mar是拿骚市一项耗资26亿美元的项目，原本将雇用4,400名建筑工人，但因其美国赌场合作伙伴的退出而停止。

sentences.en: It was not the custom for elderly people to mar the picnics with their presence.
sentences.cn: 大人们照例不参加野餐，免得扫兴。
